name: LOVE IN WHITE FOR SUMMER
description: A dreamy fresh floral that bottles white-hot nights on the CÃ´te d'Azur and the quest for eternal summer. This scent transports wearers to the French Riviera where chic white accessories, crisp waves and long holiday escapes reign. Like the sparkling hues of the ocean's reflection, iris and cedar shine through at the heart of this serene seasonal scent.
